triples.name: Semantics
triples.relevance: UCCA introduces a novel framework for semantic representation to accommodate semantic distinctions in linguistic utterances.

triples.name: Syntax
triples.relevance: The paper contrasts semantic representation with syntactic structures, which are sensitive to formal variation.

triples.name: Corpus linguistics
triples.relevance: The paper describes the compilation of a UCCA-annotated corpus for linguistic research and annotation.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Semantic representation frameworks like UCCA are fundamental to NLP tasks for understanding linguistic meaning.

triples.name: Multilingualism
triples.relevance: UCCA demonstrates portability across multiple languages with relative insensitivity to syntactic variation across language families.
